motivation.title: Motivation
quotes: Another day, another opportunity.
Every day is a new opportunity to grow and improve.
Believe in yourself and all that you are.
Your only limit is your mind.
Start each day with a positive thought.
Small steps every day lead to big results.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. — Steve Jobs
Do, or do not. There is no try. — Yoda, Star Wars
It always seems impossible until it's done. — Nelson Mandela
Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. — Dead Poets Society
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts. — Winston Churchill
Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light. — Albus Dumbledore, Harry Potter
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall. — Confucius
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take. — Wayne Gretzky
To infinity and beyond! — Buzz Lightyear, Toy Story
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. — Eleanor Roosevelt
I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed. — Michael Jordan
Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen. — Michael Jordan
Hard work beats talent when talent fails to work hard. — Kevin Durant
You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them. — Michael Jordan
Champions keep playing until they get it right. — Billie Jean King (often quoted in NBA)
Everything negative — pressure, challenges — is all an opportunity for me to rise. — Kobe Bryant
The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do. — Kobe Bryant
If you are afraid of failure you don’t deserve to be successful. — Charles Barkley
Excellence is not a singular act but a habit. You are what you repeatedly do. — Shaquille O'Neal
Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing. — Magic Johnson
Rest at the end, not at the middle. — Kobe Bryant
Job is not finished. — Kobe Bryant
